name: Cain - Habano - 660
additionalNotes: Cain Habano is handmade from a full-bodied recipe of all-Nicaraguan binder and filler tobaccos tucked under a chewy Cuban-seed wrapper leaf. Notes of red and black peppers, wood, earth, and leather pluck at the senses with perfect balance and complexity. Cain Habano is handcrafted at the legendary Oliva factory in Estel√≠, Nicaragua by a team of seasoned cigar-makers. Cain is the official brand of lumberjacks and big rig truckers thanks to the potent and peppery, Ligero-laden taste and aroma the brand delivers.
